name: Better file browser
description: A nicer file browser, easier to navigate and with ability to open folders too. You can limit how many results to show, and wheter to show hidden files or not.
developer_name: Fisa (Juan Pedro Fisanotti) Forked by Daniel Lahlafi

preferences.name: Default path
preferences.description: The file browser will always start positioned in this path.

preferences.name: Items limit
preferences.description: The file browser will show up to this number of items in the list. Leave empty for no limit.

preferences.name: Show hidden files
preferences.description: Show hidden files in the list (files and folders with names starting in '.')
